hero.headline: From our bed & breakfast, you can explore the true essence of Holland: vast open landscapes, historic windmills and charming villages leading to the coast. Here, you’ll enjoy countryside tranquility — without being far from the city.

testimonial.quote: The perfect base to explore North Holland.
testimonial.author: Georgina

highlights.title: Beach – 30 min
highlights.description: 🏖 Schoorl, Bergen or Egmond aan Zee

highlights.title: Amsterdam – 35 min
highlights.description: 🚆 Easily reached by car or train

items.title: Cycle among the windmills of the Schermer
items.description: Perfect flat routes for peaceful rides through the Dutch countryside.

items.title: Visit the Alkmaar Cheese Market
items.description: Every Friday, the Waagplein comes alive with color, sound and tradition.

items.title: A day at the beach or boating in De Rijp
items.description: Combine sun, water and dinner in a beautiful historic village.

items.title: Culture & History
items.description: Museums in Alkmaar, the Zaanse Schans, and more — all nearby but away from the crowds.

guest_experience.quote: We could go anywhere — the beach, Amsterdam, Texel — and each night we returned to the calm of Schermerhorn.
guest_experience.author: David ★ 5 / 5

cta.title: Ready to experience the real North Holland?
cta.description: Leave the noise behind and enjoy a stay filled with peace and authenticity.

seo.title: Explore North Holland – B&B Schermer Eylandt Schermerhorn
seo.description: Discover Alkmaar, the dunes, windmills and coast from Schermer Eylandt — your perfect base in the Dutch countryside.
